_header: For thee I wax all bloody upon the rood
_description: Appeal of Christ to Man by the Pains of the Passion — four lines

Bod649.Transcription:
ffor þe I wax al blody open þe rodeto wasche in þi
                    hert y scheedde mi blodAmend þe betumes and seese of þi
                    synneUndo þe dore of þin hert and let me inne
Bod649.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild. 
             A Register of Middle English Religious & Didactic Verse.
         2 vols. London: Oxford University Press for the Bibliographical
            Society: 1916-20: 1.24.
Woolf,  Rosemary. 
             The English Religious Lyric in the Middle Ages.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1968: 51.
